EmailTemplate.description: CSO Auto Triggered - Case Creation for Subject contain MTO
EmailTemplate.name: CSO - WF - Case Creation Acknowledgement MTO
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in Honeywell Aerospace products. Currently your Request for Quotation is under review. The item you have requested is considered a special or make to order part. Our response will be temporarily delayed as we review our support options.
A representative will contact you with additional information regarding this review and any required actions.
A case number has been assigned and is visible on the Subject Line of this email message. To contact a representative, reply directly to this email.
Please do not change the email subject line when you respond.
Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time
